message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value that represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Looking at the income statement provided, the line item that corresponds to general management and administration costs would be "Administrative Expenses."

In the given income statement, the Administrative Expenses amount is 863,669.20.

Therefore, the value of costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole is 863,669.20.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '863669.20'} }
```
